attention3.ptxt: For vehicle without diesel particulate filter, vehicle information with asterisk (*) below need no registration.

servinfosub.title: For ECM Replacement
servinfosub.ptxt: Using SUZUKI scan tool, be sure to transmit the following vehicle information taken from old ECM to new one or substitute ECM as follows.

item.ptxt: Key verification code (for immobilizer control system)
For further details of SUZUKI scan tool, refer to its operator’s manual.

If vehicle information cannot be read from old ECM, register/initialize them according to Registration Procedure for the Fuel Injector Calibration Code:F9Q , EGR Valve Data Initialization:F9Q , Diesel Particulate Filter Data Initialization:F9Q and Procedure after ECM Replacement:Diesel Engine Model .

s1.ptxt: Transmit fuel injector calibration codes, EGR / Inlet throttle valve data and Diesel PF (Diesel Particulate Filter) data* as follows.

s2.ptxt: Connect SUZUKI scan tool to DLC with ignition switch OFF.
Turn ignition switch to ON position.
Select “Replace ECM” of “ECM Setting” under “MISC TEST” mode of SUZUKI scan tool.
Read fuel injector calibration codes and Diesel Particulate Filter (DPF) data* from old ECM by performing “IMA and DPF data register”.
Replace old ECM with new or substituted ECM referring to Engine Control Module (ECM) Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Install calibration data to ECM if ECM is replaced with new one.
Write injector calibration codes and DPF data* to new one or substituted ECM by performing “IMA and DPF data register”.
Turn ignition switch to OFF position, and wait 120 seconds or more.

s1.ptxt: Register key verification code into ECM referring to Procedure after ECM Replacement:Diesel Engine Model .
Register key verification code to reprogrammed ECM referring to Procedure after ECM Replacement:Diesel Engine Model .

attention3.ptxt: Once ECM reprogramming is executed, vehicle information, i.e. fuel injector calibration codes and DPF, are cleared from ECM.

After ECM reprogramming is executed, register/initialize them according to Registration Procedure for the Fuel Injector Calibration Code:F9Q , EGR Valve Data Initialization:F9Q , Diesel Particulate Filter Data Initialization:F9Q , and Procedure after ECM Replacement:Diesel Engine Model .

s1.ptxt: Activate cruise control system as follows. (cruise control model)

s2.ptxt: Push cruise control “MAIN (ON/OFF)” switch for 5 seconds.
